SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCH_INCU.PROJECT WHERE LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

mapper.insert:
SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(PROJECT_ID, 4) AS UNSIGNED)) IS NULL THEN 'PRJ0001' ELSE CONCAT('PRJ', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(PROJECT_ID, 4) AS UNSIGNED)) + 1, 4, '0')) END FROM SCH_INCU.PROJECT WHERE PROJECT_ID LIKE 'PRJ%'
INSERT INTO SCH_INCU.PROJECT ( PROJECT_ID, PROJECT_NAME, EVA_CD, SCORE_FIN, EVA_START_DT, EVA_END_DT, USER_GROUP_ID, EVA_GROUP_ID, PROJECT_DETAIL, URL, DEL_YN, FRST_RGSR_ID, FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM, LAST_CHNG_ID, LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{projectId}, #{projectName}, 'A', NULL, #{evaStartDt}, #{evaEndDt}, #{userGroupId}, #{evaGroupId}, #{projectDetail}, #{url}, 'N', #{lastChngId}, NOW(), #{lastChngId}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE SCH_INCU.PROJECT SET PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName}, PROJECT_DETAIL = #{projectDetail}, URL = #{url}, LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail}, LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM = NOW() WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE SCH_INCU.PROJECT SET DEL_YN = 'Y', LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail}, LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM = NOW() WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
